basics.name: Jeanette Bellamy
basics.label: Quality Assurance Advocate
basics.summary: I have recently completed five years of military service with the United States Army. During my tenure in the service, I have acquired training and experience in a variety of areas including human resources management, staff training, operations management, customer service, and personnel administration. I am confident that I would quickly become a valuable member of your organization.
